page.title: 03EDUCATION.
page.content: There are 3 schools in this area.The Comprehensive school is for ages between 11-18.There are 1400 pupils and 80 teachers with about 29-34 pupils in a class.The resources of this school are poor.There is a wide range of subjects which can be studied to "A" level.Pupils come to this school from as far away as Lynton (20 miles).The school was built in 1969 and is situated on the top of a very windy hill.The Junior school is the second largest in Ilfracombe with an age group of 8-11.There are about 14 teachers and 380 pupils.The Infants age group is from 5-8.There are about 10 teachers and 220 pupils.There is also a private summer school called Country Cousins.This is for Foreign students to go and learn English.
